channel.title: SCARA on neon.Golem
channel.description: Recent content in SCARA on neon.Golem

item.title: neon.Prime
item.description: It’s the first robot. I needed a project for school, I also wanted a pick and place and I really wanted to play with inverse kinematics. Prime is a SCARA arm and with any luck, I’ll get it to do 0.1mm precision with both speed and power.
